mutants.code:
def reverse_string(s):
    s = s.replace('', '')
    s = s[::-1]
    return s

def reverse_string(s):
    s = s.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    s = s[::-1]
    return s

def reverse_string(s):
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    s = s[::+1]
    return s

def reverse_string(s):
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    s = s[::-2]
    return s

def reverse_string(s):
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    s = s[::-0]
    return s

def reverse_string(s):
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    s = s[::-0]
    return s

def reverse_string(s):
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    s = s[::--1]
    return s
